title: Rustc panic "no label after fn" on invalid struct with Serde
body: I tried this [code](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=c16a39e1cd58a77243e62f9faad8702c): ```rust ﻿use serde::Deserialize; #[derive(Deserialize)] struct Test<'a, str> {} ``` I expected to see this happen: Compilation error Instead, this happened: ``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no label after fn', compiler/rustc_span/src/source_map.rs:972:18 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f446a9f918d - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h8217d0a8f3fd2f41 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f446a9f918d - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h308103876b3af410 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f446a9f918d - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::hc208018c6153605e at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:66:5 3: 0x7f446a9f918d - ::fmt::hf89a7ed694dfb585 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:45:22 4: 0x7f446aa54f7c - core::fmt::write::h21038c1382fe4264 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:1197:17 5: 0x7f446a9ea8a1 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h7dbb1c9a3c254aef at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/io/mod.rs:1672:15 6: 0x7f446a9fbe55 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::h4e8889719c9ddeb8 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:48:5 7: 0x7f446a9fbe55 - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h1506fe2cb3022667 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:35:9 8: 0x7f446a9fbe55 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::hd9d7ce2a8a782440 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/panicking.rs:295:22 9: 0x7f446a9fbb76 - std::panicking::default_hook::h5b16ec25444b1b5d at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/panicking.rs:314:9 10: 0x7f446b1d6b54 - rustc_driver[e01eec72899701d3]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 11: 0x7f445c1ea343 - as core::ops::function::Fn>::call::h05e4048952ebd0e1 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1965:9 12: 0x7f445c16589d - proc_macro::bridge::client::::enter::{{closure}}::{{closure}}::ha490d0e93b9d7a7b at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/proc_macro/src/bridge/client.rs:328:21 13: 0x7f446a9fc52a - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h1680342795a2dc08 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1951:9 49: 0x7f446aa06463 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h45204a69827b0e83 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1951:9 50: 0x7f446aa06463 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::h5d4e11bbda4161c8 at /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 51: 0x7f446a92c609 - start_thread 52: 0x7f446a84f133 - clone 53: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `playground` ``` ### Meta ``` rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: 4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f commit-date: 2022-08-08 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.63.0 LLVM version: 14.0.5 ```
